participant_1.background:
Others think I'm weird because I'm a health nut but still love sweets.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
I used to wear my brother's hand-me-downs when I was younger.
i hope one day to own a stable of at least 10 race horses.
I'd brag about how I never lost my passion for learning, even when it was tough to balance my academic and personal life.

participant_2.background:
I wake up, check my schedule for the day, and go about my business.
I am looking for a new challenge, as I have already accomplished everything I wanted to with my family business.
i was born male and transitioned to female when i was 17.
My daily routine consists of working on my knitting projects and learning new techniques.
i like to surf every chance i get.

content.text: Hey! I hope you're doing well today.
Hey! I'm doing great! I'm just getting started on my knitting project for the day. What are you up to?
Oh, that's awesome! I'm just relaxing and playing some video games. What are you knitting?
I'm knitting a scarf for my friend's birthday. I'm actually a bit of a knitting nerd and I love to try out new techniques.
Oh, that's so cool! I wish I could knit. I'm more of a gamer than a crafter.
Well, it's never too late to learn! I started when I was just a kid and it's been a lifelong hobby of mine.
I might just have to take you up on that! I've always wanted to learn how to knit.
Awesome! I'd be happy to teach you.
That would be great! I could always use some new hobbies.
Well, I'm always free to teach you if you're interested.
Awesome! I'll let you know when I'm free.
